text: Buraly () is a rural locality (a village) in Iteyevsky Selsoviet, Ilishevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 235 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 12 km from Verkhneyarkeyevo, 4 km from Iteyevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ilishevsky District
title: Buraly
